I confirm I have read the agreement.

This is where the disclosure agreement will go once the wording has been finalised. 

Unless the user scrolls to the bottom of the agreement and ticks the box, the 'accept' button is disabled. 

For all new users, the disclosure agreement will appear when they first start the app - before any sensors have been identified and before their Unique ID is assigned. 

In the same way the Unique ID only gets set once, the disclosure agreement will not show after the first time starting the app (unless the user declines to accept, in which case they won't get past the agreement no matter how many times they restart the app.
